Differential scanning calorimetry.Protocol: Heated from room temperature to 290°C at 10°Cmin-1, held there for 10min, and cooled back to room temperature at 10°Cmin-1

Measurements: Absolute modulus through mechanical vibration measurements
Compression tests at a strain rate of 0.5% s-1
Tensile tests at a strain rate of 0.5% s-1 and ambient temperature
Volume changes during tensile tests at room temperature recorded on a 'cavitometer'

Wide angle X-ray scattering.Radiation: Ni filtered CuKα radiation (in point collimation)

Small angle X-ray scattering.Radiation: Ni filtered CuKα radiation (in point collimation)

Composite systems production.Method: In situ polymerisation around the inorganic fillers
